meanings.definition: A style of Cuban dance music.
meanings.sent1: The band played lively habaneras at the dance party.
meanings.sent2: People love to dance to habaneras at festivals.
meanings.sent3: The habaneras started a spontaneous dance-off in the park.
meanings.sent4: The habaneras filled the air with infectious rhythms.
meanings.sent5: The habaneras echoed through the streets, inviting everyone to join the fun.

meanings.sent1: The recipe called for habaneras to add a spicy kick.
meanings.sent2: She grew habaneras in her garden for homemade salsa.
meanings.sent3: The habaneras made the dish so hot, it set off the fire alarm!
meanings.sent4: The habaneras added a fiery touch to the meal.
meanings.sent5: The habaneras packed a punch of heat that lingered on the taste buds.
